thread.title_full: Women in Pakistan just want to have fun -- like the men - WBIR-TV Knoxville - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WBIR-TV Knoxville
title: Women in Pakistan just want to have fun -- like the men - WBIR-TV Knoxville
text:
Women in Pakistan just want to have fun -- like the men In Pakistan, a group of young women are fighting discrimination, one teacup at a time. Check out this story on WBIR.com: http://usat.ly/1LzukKC LAHORE, Pakistan - It's largely taboo for women to walk alone on the street here.
 WBIR-TV Knoxville.
